fxInfo_clarification: The following questions are focused on actual practices (de facto) rather than formal legal or constitutional rights (de jure).
fxInfo_historical_clarification: The following questions are focused on actual practices (de facto) rather than formal legal or constitutional rights (de jure). Note that if there is significant variation in the respect for a particular civil liberty across the territory, the score should reflect the”average situation” across the territorial scope of the country unit (for each period) as defined in the coder instructions.
name: v2clintro
